definition: a chess move constituting an inescapable and indefensible attack on the opponent's king, to place an opponent's king under an attack from which it cannot escape and thus ending the game
details:
noun
- a chess move constituting an inescapable and indefensible attack on the opponent's king
= synonyms: mate
- complete victory
verb
- to place an opponent's king under an attack from which it cannot escape and thus ending the game
= example: to place an opponent's king under an attack from which it cannot escape and thus ending the game
= synonyms: mate
